casebody.data:
No. 09-6425. No. 09-6516. Paul H. Richards and Bevan Atlee Thomas, Petitioners v. United States. Paula Harris, Petitioner v. United States. 561 U.S. 1041, 130 S. Ct. 3542,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1120,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5534. June 29, 2010.

Motions of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and *1121petitions for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of Skilling v. United States, 561 U.S. 358, 130 S. Ct. 2896, 177 L. Ed. 2d 619 (2010).

Same cases below, 313 Fed. Appx. 969.
